channel.title: Any idea on how to make your runserver.bat be able to do commands?
channel.description:
Does anyone here know if it's possible to make your run.bat batch file be able to follow through commands like give a player admin/mod or even kick/ban someone without being logged into the server? :) If so, thank you! Very much...
But - If you think it's pretty damn complicated, just tell me. I don't really need it. So, if you can give me a general idea of how i might go about doing that, thanks! A bunch! :)

item.title: Any idea on how to make your runserver.bat be able to do commands?
